alert.note: Alert for Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 18 at 9:39PM CDT until June 18 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CHICOT AND CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 939 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Village, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Wayside and Avon around 955 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
